message: Abbreviation in name 'DBMigrationController' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'}' at column 9 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
'}' at column 5 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
'method call rparen' has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be 8.
